ygData.subject: Re: Poison, vials, pottery
ygData.messageBody:
<<Here is what some of our better potters have come up with as far as a good
possibility. This formula was tried and they did not get the msg these Items do
not combine to create anything. They simply got you do not have enough skill.>>

Denali, can you give us an estimate of what skill level these folks were at?
Most "Master" Potters i know are varying between 115 (the highest, i believe,
you can get with just Pie Tins) and 148 (the highest, i believe, you can get
with Large Bowls). I myself and a 133, and conveniently currently in Everfrost.
I'll try to pick up some of the items mentioned tonight.

- Nikolita, Floating Merchant
